content: Thanks to @Eric Wieser and @Jireh Loreaux, I got elaborators for docs#MeasureTheory.AE and f =ᵐ[μ] gworking. However, the latter is a bit weak in the sense that it doesn't make use of the expected types of f and g to elaborate μ. This results in a few elaboration errors in #13740. Does anyone have advice on how to make this elaborator more robust?
